comment: Smart Data Models - WindGenTurbineType3IEC adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/WindGenTurbineType3IEC/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Generator model for wind turbines of IEC type 3A and 3B.

contents.name: WindAeroLinearIEC
contents.comment: Wind aerodynamic model associated with this wind generator type 3 model. Default: None

contents.name: WindContPType3IEC
contents.comment: Wind control P type 3 model associated with this wind turbine type 3 model. Default: None

contents.name: WindContPitchAngleIEC
contents.comment: Wind control pitch angle model associated with this wind turbine type 3. Default: None

contents.name: WindMechIEC
contents.comment: Wind mechanical model associated with this wind turbine Type 3 model. Default: None

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dipmax
contents.comment: Maximum active current ramp rate (di). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: diqmax
contents.comment: Maximum reactive current ramp rate (di). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)
